pre: ^What! Can't you see I am busy right now?
^I need to call my insurance company! Go away!
main: ^Hey, hurry up! I don't have all day to mess around.
question1: ^What do you do in this cafe?
^Was there any previous incidence of food poisoning?
^I have no more questions for you. Thank you

answer1: ^Yo, what kind of question is this?
^Can't you see I am the owner here?
^Do the others look like they can manage a shop?

c-0: ^I am the only one who can make good coffee here.
^I mean, can you trust those dumb kids?

s: ^Is there anything else that you do?

c-0: ^Huh? I do literally everything here! Buying the ingredients, managing the stock, cleaning of the storeroom...
^Those kids are definitely getting more salary than they deserved!

answer2: ^That weirdo? Yes, he is a really coffee addict. Of course, my coffee always make my customers come back.
^This weirdo always sits at the same spot every time he comes. I mean, with such a crazy hairstyle, it is hard not to remember him, right?
answer3: ^Our cafe has a best reputation in the whole town!
^Stop questioning the quality of our food!

b: ^I have given you enough of my time. Now, please don't stand in my way.

answer3version2: ^Are you sure you have no more questions?
^My time is precious, so ask in one go!
^Was there any previous incidence of food poisoning?

b: ^I have given you enough of my time. Now, please don't stand in my way.

post: ^What do you want! Didn't I just talk to you? Like a second ago?
